name: aaron forth
text: The food was made well and the service was great! The website was well done for a small business, the status updates were accurate and my salad (I love a well made salad) was made very well. I appreciate when my food is made with care.

name: Me Brown
text: Order placed for lunch for 6 of us.  Great turn around time. Had my order within the 45 minute time limit. Delivered by a very courteous polite person. Food was the right temp and very good thank you!!!

name: Carol Terry
text: Great pizza. Love the flavored crust and great pricing as well!

name: Helen Gutierrez
text: Pizza ok ! However we ordered un sauced wings, this is what unsauced wings look like lol ! And when we called them to ask they said oh yeah we don‚Äôt have thAt! Would have been nice to know before we ordered! However the person on the phone ‚Ä¶More

text: Best, fast, delivery pizza. Everything always tastes fresh instead of microwaved like some other places.

name: Paige Jones
text: Usually i don‚Äôt have a bad review but i ordered for delivery and they told me 45 mins and i have to wait a hour and a half for my pizza which is unacceptable and they told me they couldn‚Äôt do anything for me that i just had to wait

name: Patricia D
text: We had their pizza delivered to us in Pensacola Florida and the pizzas were wonderful!

name: Sarah Stanley
text: Hungry Howie's had great pizza but my family always goes for it because of the flavored pizza crusts. You can add as many flavors to the crust as you like and it makes the pizza so much more enjoyable because you don't feel the need to not ‚Ä¶More

name: A NO-NONSENSE GOOGLE USER
text: Please do yourself a favor and DON'T GO HERE.  Arrived when they opened and front door was locked.  Went to the side entrance and was barked at by an awful unkept women with a mustache (who looked like she came out of a horror movie set) ‚Ä¶More

name: john knouse
text: First discovered this chain in Florida.  Moved here, and found this one.  The staff was nice and polite.  Got my order out to me fast every time.  Manager even handled a coupon issue once that wasn't right from the website to make it right. ‚Ä¶More

name: Victoria Avina
text: I love this place! I work across the street and come here to eat all the time! They have the most amazing pizza! You can't beat a huge pizza! Great deal! Delicious food! Nice staff too!

name: Jay Blaker
text: In Tulsa from out of town late on a Saturday night, I chose to order delivery from this place because I never heard of it and the reviews were generally very positive.  Amazed to say that I love this place. Wish we had one in Omaha. Great ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Barlow
text: The sandwiches are spectacular. The pizza is good. Crust is a smidge chewy and the sauce is a bit too tomatoey. I love the added spices you can get. To be fair I gave them a 4 star but my family insisted on 5 star because they love the crust and sauce.

name: Parker Steyer
text: One of my favorite pizza places to go to. I always get thin crust, double pepperoni and always change up what crust flavor I get. I do wish they'd bring back the bacon ranch flavor. That one has been my favorite so far.

name: Blake Adams
text: Hungry howies is the best pizza ever made.

name: Angela Soper-Andrews
text: DO NOT buy wings from this place. I placed an order last night and requested that the wings be well done. They got to my home and were slimy and pink in the middle. They were not done at all. I actually had to put them in my oven at 400¬∞ ‚Ä¶More

text: Good pizza! Flavored crust was pretty good. **The ranch flavored crust for one reason or another did not bode well with any of the family members that night.** Cheese bread was on point!

text: Best pizza in town. Great prices. Awesome staff.

name: Jerry Harris
text: I just ordered two pizzas and hot wings and the delivery guy was cool as hell. The food is awesome. The price is super reasonable for the quality of food. I will definitely delete Mazzio's and Papa John's number when it's time to order pizza for my kids. How have I never heard of this place until tonight?

text: Love the flavored crust! Especially the butter cheese kind.

name: Josh B
text: Its better than mazzios for me so. Ordered my pizza and they handed out mine to someone else..had to wait for them to make a new one. Might as well go to Hideaway.

text: Turkey club sub !!!!! Best sub in the world ! I drive over an hour to eat here and have for 10 years love it !!!

text: In my opinion their isn't a better pizza for the money! The food was great ! The pizza parlor was clean in the staff friendly in knowageabl!

text: I always love their pizza. It‚Äôs my favorite in town. They often send me emails for free pizza as well with no purchase required. Their flavored crust is top notch!

name: Albert Moralez
text: Delivery driver was friendly and pizza was delivered before estimated time. Pizza was hot and had some surprisingly long cheese pulls. Toppings were good, crust was perfect! Great overall taste! I was not disappointed, I would definitely order again.

text: Some of the best pizza I have ever had

text: So the idea of flavored crust is some kind of a flavored salt on the rim of the crust.  The crust got soggy after 40 min.  The woman at the counter was very nice, so no complaints on the service.  Web ordering was easy.  The toppings were ‚Ä¶More

name: Sam Dubois
text: Stopped by here one time and wasn't disappointed! What IS disappointing is that this location doesn't deliver to my home in Tulsa. Loved the pizza so much, this is very sad news. Hope to see a HH closer to my place one day!

name: Bec K
text: Great food, great workers, excellent customer service. Cant beat it!

text: Live in northeast Oklahoma. Every trip to Tulsa we make a stop. Best calzones EVER nad fantastic salad.

name: Amia Crawford
text: The flavored crust is great but the customer service sucks!! Who ever is taking the orders hates his job. Tip of advice.. learn some customer service skills.

text: I've been eating here 16 years now and in my opinion the bone-in wings are the best and the 3 Cheeser Bread is ridiculously awesome. ‚Ä¶More
